title: FO-11: E2E Testing
description:

Creates comprehensive E2E tests for FO-11 covering both the skip and non-skip discovery flows, tone single-word chips, affirmation generation, card review, and the full end-to-end flow.

## Spec Reference

`docs/projects/2026-02-11-fo-11/2026-02-11-fo-11-spec.md` — Section: "Testing Strategy"

## Worker Instructions

- Complete tasks in order
- Read `docs/projects/2026-02-11-fo-11/implementation-notes.md` before starting
- Append your learnings to `docs/projects/2026-02-11-fo-11/implementation-notes.md` when all tasks are done

notes: 2026-02-11 15:27 - EPIC COMPLETE: Created comprehensive E2E tests for FO-11 in e2e/fo-11.test.ts. Tests cover both non-skip (brief goal) and skip (rich goal) flows, validating LLM-generated questions, fragment chips, single-word tone chips, heart animations, card review, create-more second batch, and full completion.
